text: She _____ to the store every morning.
explanation: Use 'goes' with third person singular in present simple tense.

text: I _____ working on this project right now.
explanation: Use 'am' with 'I' in present continuous tense.

text: They _____ playing football at the moment.
explanation: Use 'are' with 'they' in present continuous tense.

text: I need _____ pen to write this letter.

explanation: Use 'an' before vowel sounds like 'honest' (silent h).
Use 'the' with unique objects like the sun.

text: I will call you _____ the evening.
explanation: Use 'in' with parts of the day (morning, afternoon, evening).
Use 'on' with days of the week.

text: If I _____ rich, I would travel the world.
explanation: Second conditional uses 'were' for all persons after 'if'.

text: If it _____ tomorrow, we will cancel the picnic.
explanation: First conditional uses present simple in the if-clause.
